By going through the answers to these questions on "Question Time".it is clear to me that some of the answers have been created by a generative AI system like ChatBGT.  In my line of work, I have become familiar with some "ChatGBT words" like "underscored" and "leveraged" and can easily recognise these from the supposed answers from the speakers, and this is a big giveaway.  After thinking about this I changed my mind and ticked "disagree" about the use of AI in public debates as these are computer-generated and formulaic answers that do not capture the real essence (nor sometimes authenticity) of what the speaker is saying.
